page.title: 16UPWOOD MANOR (PART 1)
page.content:
Upwood Manor used to be owned by the Cromwells.It was one big house but now it's been split into three parts. Duncan Bell's family own the biggest part.Under the main hall there is supposed to be a passage leading to Ramsey Abbey or to a possible nearby wood.The walls of the House are made of reeds,animal furs and dung.There is a hole in one of the bedrooms to a derelict servant's room.In there you can see how the walls and how the roof were made.In the back garden you can see the chimneys and the warren which used to be full of rabbits.
by Tim and Duncan
